tokens.resolved_gloss: to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain)
tokens.translation: to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, failure, i.e. nothing or destruction; usually (with preposition) without, not yet, because not, as long as, etc.
tokens.translation: properly, failure, i.e. nothing or destruction; usually (with preposition) without, not yet, because not, as long as, etc.

tokens.resolved_gloss: a garment (literally or figuratively); by implication (euphemistically) a wife
